testimony: What a great experience using Waypal! I booked all of my flights for my gap year through Waypal and never had any issues. When I had to cancel a flight because of an emergency, Waypal support helped me.

My family and I visit Hawaii every year, and we usually book our flights using other services. Waypal was recommened to us by a long time friend, and I’m so glad we tried it out! The process was easy.

When I was looking to book my flight to Berlin from LAX, Waypal had the best browsing experiece so I figured I’d give it a try. It was my first time using Waypal, but I’d definitely recommend it to a friend.
